duties_responsibilities.duty: Identify, categorize, and manage various technology projects to enhance and automate business processes.
Develop and manage project budgets, schedules, and requirements for new systems and enhancements.
Leverage existing technology platforms to drive additional value.
Be the lead interface between departments to ensure stakeholder needs are met.
Assist in optimizing scope, benefits, and risks of proposed projects.
Create and document operational interface instructions for business applications.
Train and mentor personnel on business applications.
Provide technical assistance, coaching, and participate in field assignments as directed.

education_certification.credential: 4-year College degree in Information Technology or related field (preferred)
